actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the taking of a photograph in the Chamber of the United States Senate on Tuesday, September 25, 1984, at 2:00 p.m.

summary.text: Suspends temporarily rule IV of the Rules for the Regulation of the Senate (prohibiting the taking of pictures in the Senate Chamber) to allow the National Geographic Society to photograph the Senate in session on September 25, 1984.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the taking of a photograph in the Chamber of the United States Senate on Tuesday, September 25, 1984, at 2:00 p.m.
